title: The Cookouts Are About To Be On Fire With This “Boo’d Up” Line Dance
content: Source: Nick David / Getty It ain’t a summer cookout until all the aunties come together for a good old-fashioned line dance. While Maze featuring Frankie Beverly or the “Cha Cha Slide” are the most popular go-to’s, it appears there’s a new dance in town and it’s all thanks to Ella Mai’s “Boo’d Up”. Me at every cookout this summer: pic.twitter.com/VEqH6FAJMj — driz (@dresquiat) May 29, 2018 Will you be learning these steps, or nah?
